mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT FROM ( SELECT C.CH_TAG_NO AS CHTAGNO, C.CH_B_NO AS CHBNO, S.CONTENT AS CONTENT FROM CHECKTAG C, STICKER S WHERE C.CSTICKER_NO=S.CSTICKER_NO(+) ORDER BY CHTAGNO ) WHERE CHBNO=#{chbNo}

SELECT CONTENT FROM ( SELECT M.MC_TAG_NO AS MCTAGNO, M.CHECK_NO AS CHECKNO, CONTENT AS CONTENT FROM MYCHECKTAG M, STICKER S WHERE M.CSTICKER_NO=S.CSTICKER_NO(+) ORDER BY MCTAGNO ) WHERE CHECKNO=#{checkNo}
SELECT CONTENT FROM ( SELECT L.LO_TAG_NO AS LOTAGNO, L.LO_B_NO AS LOBNO, S.CONTENT AS CONTENT FROM LOCALTAG L, STICKER S WHERE L.CSTICKER_NO=S.CSTICKER_NO(+) ORDER BY LOTAGNO ) WHERE LOBNO=#{lobNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYCHECKTAG(MC_TAG_NO, CHECK_NO, CSTICKER_NO) VALUES(#{tagNo}, #{checkNo}, #{stickerNo})
INSERT INTO CHECKTAG(CH_TAG_NO, CH_B_NO, CSTICKER_NO) VALUES(#{tagNo}, #{chbNo}, #{stickerNo})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(MC_TAG_NO)+1 AS TAG_NO FROM MYCHECKTAG
SELECT MAX(CH_TAG_NO)+1 AS TAG_NO FROM CHECKTAG
SELECT MAX(CSTICKER_NO)+1 AS STICKERNO FROM STICKER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STICKER(CSTICKER_NO, AC_NO, CONTENT) VALUES(#{stickerNo}, #{acNo}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT MCTAGNO AS TAGNO, CONTENT FROM ( SELECT M.MC_TAG_NO AS MCTAGNO, M.CHECK_NO AS CHECKNO, CONTENT AS CONTENT FROM MYCHECKTAG M, STICKER S WHERE M.CSTICKER_NO=S.CSTICKER_NO(+) ORDER BY MCTAGNO ) WHERE CHECKNO=#{checkNo}

SELECT CHTAGNO AS TAGNO, CONTENT FROM ( SELECT C.CH_TAG_NO AS CHTAGNO, C.CH_B_NO AS CHBNO, S.CONTENT AS CONTENT FROM CHECKTAG C, STICKER S WHERE C.CSTICKER_NO=S.CSTICKER_NO(+) ORDER BY CHTAGNO ) WHERE CHBNO=#{chbNo}

SELECT LOTAGNO AS TAGNO, CONTENT FROM ( SELECT L.LO_TAG_NO AS LOTAGNO, L.LO_B_NO AS LOBNO, S.CONTENT AS CONTENT FROM LOCALTAG L, STICKER S WHERE L.CSTICKER_NO=S.CSTICKER_NO(+) ORDER BY LOTAGNO ) WHERE LOBNO=#{lobNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT CSTICKER_NO FROM MYCHECKTAG UNION ALL SELECT CSTICKER_NO FROM CHECKTAG UNION ALL SELECT CSTICKER_NO FROM LOCALTAG) WHERE CSTICKER_NO=#{stickerNo}
